text: Isaac Berenblum Isaac Berenblum, (Hebrew: יצחק ברנבלום, born 26 August 1903, died 18 April 2000) was an Israeli biochemist. ==Awards== * In 1974, Berenblum was awarded the Israel Prize, in life science. *In 1980, he received the Alfred P. Sloan, Jr., Award given by the General Motors Cancer Research Foundation. == See also == *List of Israel Prize recipients ==References== ==External links== * * Prof. Isaac BERENBLUM * Charter Members | World Academy of Art & Science Category:1903 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Polish Jews Category:Israeli Jews Category:Israeli biochemists Category:Alumni of the University of Leeds Category:Israel Prize in life sciences recipients Category:Israel Prize in life sciences recipients who were biochemists Category:Members of the Israel Academy of Sciences and Humanities Category:Weizmann Institute of Science faculty Category:Hebrew University of Jerusalem faculty
title: Isaac Berenblum
